sentences.english: As the rapid development of optical fiber communication, the demand on silica based single mode fiber (SMF) is increasing dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 光通信迅速發展，對單模光纖的需求急劇增長。

sentences.english: With eccentricity increasing a single-mode single-polarization fiber is easier to make.
sentences.chinese: 偏心率越大越有利於製造單模單偏光纖。

sentences.english: The generation of single-mode sub-Poissonian light by lasers is studied.
sentences.chinese: 對利用激光器產生單模亞泊松光進行了研究。

sentences.english: MFD of single mode fiber has several definitions and measurements.
sentences.chinese: 單模光纖模場直徑有多種定義和測量的方法。

sentences.english: Many companies also are installing a combination of singlemode and multimode fiber in backbones.
sentences.chinese: 還有許多公司在主幹網中結合安裝單模和多模光纖。

sentences.english: The module is robustly single mode and polarizing.
sentences.chinese: 該模塊具有穩定的單模和保偏效果。

sentences.english: This Recommendation covers the characteristics of a cut-off shifted single-mode optical fibre cable.
sentences.chinese: 本建議包括截止波長位移單模光纖光纜的特性。

sentences.english: Therefore, measurement of mode field diameter of single mode fibers by far-field mask is realized.
sentences.chinese: 實現了用遠場掩模法對單模光纖模場直徑的測量。
